actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.
actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious
